name: European Federation of Healthcare Clown Organizations
goal:
Efhco is the umbrella body representing healthcare clown organizations with professional trained clowns in European Healthcare (in hospitals or special institutions for kids, seniors, dementia or any special needs).
By bringing humor, solace and laughter into hospitals, hospices, residential or day cares, Healthcare clowns have been found to boost the resistance and willpower of their patients, whether young children or adults.

The Federation is Brussels-based and represents registered NGOs from Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Portugal, Sweden, The Netherlands, UK plus Norway and Switzerland.

efhco aims to
1) Raise awareness for the importance of professional clowns work in healthcare
2) Lobbying for a Common EU Qualification in professional Clown Training and within the Curricula of Medical staff; Establish best practices and working methods
3) Maintain the standard of the Quality Label by efhco, offered by regular audits for its members
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Youth
